item.title: Debian安装python38
item.description: 源码安装 1、安装依赖包 1 sudo apt-get install build-essential python-dev python-setuptools python-pip python-smbus build-essential libncursesw5-dev libgdbm-dev libc6-dev zlib1g-dev libsqlite3-dev tk-dev libssl-dev openssl libffi-dev 2、下载python3.8源码 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 ##更新 sudo apt-get update ##下载 wget https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-380/ ##解压 tar -xvf Python-3.8.0.tar.xz cd Python-3.8.0/ 3、配置，编
